basic_info.description: ðŸ‘‹ My name is Sharmarke Nur. I am a Full-Stack Software Developer with knowledge of the languages HTML, CSS, and Javascript using VS Code. I decided to learn Software Development due to not being fulfilled with where I was at and wanted a change of direction for my life. I have some family who work in the field of tech in IT and felt that was the direction I wanted to go.  An ideal environment I'd utilize my skills is in a team setting. I say that because I feel like I thrive in those settings due to my previous experiences in working apart of a team. One example is a final video project I have done that did really well, generating over 400 thousand views. Being apart of a team, communication and listening to others ideas are vital to being successful in team environment, which is why I feel that being in a team is an environment for me.

projects.title: Odd Duck
projects.description: Created a project about clicking photos on the page that has 25 rounds and will not show the same image on the next round. In the end, the images clicked and viewed will be shown in a bar graph.

projects.title: Cookie Stand
projects.description: Created a website for an upstart company and provided statistics of sales from different cities.

projects.title: Recipe Blogger
projects.description: Worked with a team to create a webpage that will show three different cuisines, three different recipes that when you click one of the recipes will show the procedure of what is needed to be done, provides vegan and meat options, can add comments, and you are able to favorite them.
